ygData.subject: Re: Question on skill maximums per level...
ygData.msgSnippet: well, don t know about offense and defense, as mine are only in the high 80 s at lvl 25, but my dodge hit 75 a while ago, and hasn t moved since (and it was
ygData.messageBody:
well, don't know about offense and defense, as mine are only in the high
80's at lvl 25, but my dodge hit 75 a while ago, and hasn't moved since (and
it was going up pretty regularly too).

Sinlaru Ce`alen
Rallos Zek

-----Original Message-----
From: rhoward@... <rhoward@...>
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, June 15, 1999 11:39 AM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Question on skill maximums per level...


>From: rhoward@...
>
>Hi all.
>
>I've been lurking on this list for awhile and have a question to ask you
all. I read awhile back, a posting from someone who said that a Wizard's
Offense and Defense skills max out at (Level *4). This seems to hold for me
in Offense, as my Offense skill at 25th level topped out at 100. For some
reason though, my defense skill is stuck at 90... Is this what everyone
>else is exeriencing?
>(Last night, I finally gained 26th level and my Defense went up to 91, so I
know it was stopped at 90 until I leveled.)
>
>Also, my Dodge and Throwing skills have stopped advancing at 75. Is this
our limit in these skills as well?
>
>---
>Lews, 26th level Wizard on Bertoxx
>
>
